TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbDataReader extends System.Data.Common.DbDataReader
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbDataReader Inherits DbDataReader
public ref class OleDbDataReader sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataReader

summary.span: 提供自資料來源讀取順向資料流的資料列的方法。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of data rows from a data source.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立，您必須呼叫方法物件，而不是直接使用建構函式。To create an , you must call the method of the object, instead of directly using a constructor. 在關閉之前，先關閉物件。Before you close the , first close the object. 您也必須關閉物件如果您計劃 resuse物件。比方說，您無法擷取輸出參數，直到您呼叫之後。You must also close the object if you plan to resuse an object.For example, you cannot retrieve output parameters until after you call . 結果集，另一個處理序或執行緒正在讀取資料時所做的變更可能會顯示給使用者，是。Changes made to a result set by another process or thread while data is being read may be visible to the user of the . 不過，精確的行為取決於時間點。However, the precise behavior is timing dependent. 並是您可以呼叫之後的唯一屬性已關閉。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed. 雖然可能會存取屬性雖然存在，一定要呼叫傳回的值之前以確保正確的傳回值。Although the property may be accessed while the exists, always call before returning the value of to guarantee an accurate return value. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，則，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 此範例會讀取資料，並將它寫出到主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最後，範例會關閉，然後。Finally, the example closes the and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataReader Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataReader Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉 物件。

span.span: Closes the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須明確呼叫方法，當您透過使用相關聯用於其他用途。You must explicitly call the method when you are through using the to use the associated for any other purpose. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿呼叫**關閉**或是**處置**連線、 DataReader 或在任何其他 managed 的物件上**Finalize**類別方法。Do not call **Close** or **Dispose** on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the **Finalize** method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該僅釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果您的類別未擁有任何 unmanaged 的資源，並包含**Finalize**類別定義中的方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a **Finalize** method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立，則，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 此範例會讀取資料，並將它寫出到主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最後，範例會關閉，然後。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，表示目前資料列的巢狀深度。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the depth of nesting for the current row.

value.span: 目前資料列的巢狀深度。

span.span: The depth of nesting for the current row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最外層的資料表深度為零。The outermost table has a depth of zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property FieldCount As Integer
public: virtual property int FieldCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前資料列中的資料行數目。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 當未置於有效的資料錄集中時，則為 0，否則為目前資料錄中的資料行數目。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid recordset, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含隱藏欄位。Includes hidden fields. 使用 以排除隱藏欄位。Use to exclude hidden fields. 在執行的查詢，不會傳回資料列之後會傳回 0。After executing a query that does not return rows, returns 0.

exception.span: 沒有對資料來源的目前連接。

span.span: There is no current connection to a data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public override long GetBytes (int ordinal, long dataIndex, byte[] buffer, int bufferIndex, int length);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int64 GetBytes(int32 ordinal, int64 dataIndex, unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 bufferIndex, int32 length) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetBytes (ordinal As Integer, dataIndex As Long, buffer As Byte(), bufferIndex As Integer, length As Integer) As Long
public: override long GetBytes(int ordinal, long dataIndex, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int bufferIndex, int length);
override this.GetBytes : int * int64 * byte[] * int * int -> int64

param.name: ordinal
param.span: 以零為基底的資料行序數。

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: dataIndex
param.span: 要開始讀取作業之欄位中的索引。

span.span: The index within the field from which to start the read operation.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要將位元組資料流讀取到其中的緩衝區。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferIndex
param.span: 內寫入作業開始之處的索引。

span.span: The index within the where the write operation is to start.

param.name: length
param.span: 複製入緩衝區的最大長度。

span.span: The maximum length to copy into the buffer.

summary.span: 從指定的資料行位移將位元組資料流讀入做為陣列的緩衝區，開始於指定的緩衝區位移。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 讀取的實際位元組數目。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在欄位中傳回可用位元組的數。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 大多數情況下這是欄位的實際長度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的長度，則為 true 如果`GetBytes`已經使用來取得位元組的欄位。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 這可能是，比方說，當讀入緩衝區的大型資料結構。This may be the case, for example, when the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < `SequentialAccess` 設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果您傳遞的緩衝區`null`，傳回欄位的長度，以位元組為單位。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, returns the length of the field in bytes. 不會進行轉換;因此，擷取的資料必須已經是位元組陣列。No conversions are performed; therefore, the data retrieved must already be a byte array.

param.name: ordinal

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: dataIndex
param.span: 要開始讀取作業之資料列中的索引。

span.span: The index within the row from which to start the read operation.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要複製資料的目的緩衝區。

span.span: The buffer into which to copy data.

param.name: bufferIndex
param.span: 內寫入作業開始之處的索引。

span.span: The index within the where the write operation is to start.

param.name: length
param.span: 要讀取的字元數。

span.span: The number of characters to read.

summary.span: 從指定的資料行位移將字元的資料流讀入做為陣列的緩衝區，開始於指定的緩衝區位移。

span.span: Reads a stream of characters from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array starting at the given buffer offset.
The actual number of characters read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在欄位中傳回可用字元的數。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 大多數情況下這是欄位的實際長度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的長度，則為 true 如果`GetChars`已經使用從欄位取得字元。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 這可能是，比方說，當讀入緩衝區的大型資料結構。This may be the case, for example, when the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < `SequentialAccess` 設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果您傳遞的緩衝區`null`，傳回欄位的長度，以字元為單位。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, returns the length of the field in characters. 不會進行轉換;因此，擷取的資料必須已經是字元陣列。No conversions are performed; therefore, the data retrieved must already be a character array.

returns.span: 以零為基底的資料行序數。

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次執行區分大小寫的查閱。 performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失敗，會使用第二個的不區分大小寫搜尋。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 方法會擲回`IndexOutOfRange`exceptionif 找不到的以零為起始的資料行序數。The method throws an `IndexOutOfRange` exceptionif the zero-based column ordinal is not found. 假名寬度是不區分大小寫的。 is kana-width insensitive. 因為根據序數進行查閱比具名查閱更有效率，很效率不佳，呼叫迴圈內。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call within a loop. 節省時間，藉由呼叫一次，並將結果指派給整數變數以便使用於迴圈。Save time by calling one time and assigning the results to an integer variable for use within the loop. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的名稱不是有效的資料行名稱。

span.span: The name specified is not a valid column name.
DataAdapters and DataReaders

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchemaTable() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchemaTable () As DataTable

summary.span: 傳回 ，以描述 的資料行中繼資料。

span.span: Returns a that describes the column metadata of the .

returns.span: 描述資料行中繼資料的 。

span.span: A that describes the column metadata.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法會對應至 OLE DB **icolumnsrowset:: Getcolumnsrowset**方法，並以下列順序的每一資料行傳回中繼資料：The method maps to the OLE DB **IColumnsRowset::GetColumnsRowset** method, and returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 資料行DataReader column|OLE DB 資料行識別碼OLE DB column ID|描述Description| |-----------------------|----------------------|-----------------| |ColumnNameColumnName|DBCOLUMN_NAMEDBCOLUMN_NAME|資料行的名稱這可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果無法判別，則會傳回 null 值。If this cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 這個名稱永遠會反映最近的目前檢視] 或 [命令文字中的資料行重新命名。This name always reflects the most recent renaming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|DBCOLUMN_NUMBERDBCOLUMN_NUMBER|資料行以零為起始的序數。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此資料行不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|DBCOLUMN_COLUMNSIZEDBCOLUMN_COLUMNSIZE|資料行中值的最大可能長度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 使用固定長度資料類型的資料行，這是資料類型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|DBCOLUMN_PRECISIONDBCOLUMN_PRECISION|如果 DbType 是數值資料類型，這會是資料行的最大有效位數。If DbType is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column. DBTYPE_DECIMAL 或 DBTYPE_NUMERIC 的資料類型的資料行的有效位數，取決於資料行的定義。The precision of columns with a data type of DBTYPE_DECIMAL or DBTYPE_NUMERIC depends on the definition of the column. 如果 DbType 不是數值資料類型，這會是 null 值。If DbType is not a numeric data type, this is a null value.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|DBCOLUMN_SCALEDBCOLUMN_SCALE|如果 DBTYPE_DECIMAL 或 DBTYPE_NUMERIC DbType，這是小數點右邊的位數。If DbType is DBTYPE_DECIMAL or DBTYPE_NUMERIC, this is the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. 否則，這會是 null 值。Otherwise, this is a null value.| |DataTypeDataType|無None|會對應至資料行的.NET Framework 型別。Maps to the .NET Framework type of the column.| |ProviderTypeProviderType|DBCOLUMN_TYPEDBCOLUMN_TYPE|資料行的資料類型的指標。The indicator of the column's data type. 如果資料行的資料類型而有所不同逐列，這必須是 DBTYPE_VARIANT。If the data type of the column varies from row to row, this must be DBTYPE_VARIANT. 此資料行不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |IsLongIsLong|DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISLONGDBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISLONG|如果資料行包含二進位長物件 (BLOB)，其中包含很長的資料，提供者會設定 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISLONG。The provider sets DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISLONG if the column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data. 非常長資料的定義是特定提供者。The definition of very long data is provider-specific. 此旗標的設定會對應至資料型別的 PROVIDER_TYPES 資料列集內 IS_LONG 資料行的值。The setting of this flag corresponds to the value of the IS_LONG column in the PROVIDER_TYPES rowset for the data type.| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISNULLABLEDBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISNULLABLE|如果取用者可以將資料行設定為 null 的值，或如果無法判斷提供者，取用者是否可以設定為 null 值的資料行，提供者會設定 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISNULLABLE。The provider sets DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISNULLABLE if the consumer can set the column to a null value, or if the provider cannot determine whether the consumer can set the column to a null value. 資料行可能包含 null 值，即使它不能設為 null 的值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |IsReadOnlyIsReadOnly|DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITEDBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITE|`true` 如果無法修改資料行;否則`false`。`true` if the column cannot be modified; otherwise `false`. 資料行被假設為可寫入，如果提供者已設定 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITE 」 或 「 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITEUNKNOWN 旗標。The column is assumed to be writable if the provider has set either the DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITE or DBCOLUMNFLAGS_WRITEUNKNOWN flag.| |IsRowVersionIsRowVersion|DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISROWIDDBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISROWID|提供者設定 DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISROWID，如果資料行都包含永續性資料列識別碼，不能寫入，且除了識別資料列的有意義值。The provider sets DBCOLUMNFLAGS_ISROWID if the column contains a persistent row identifier that cannot be written to, and has no meaningful value except to identity the row.| |IsUniqueIsUnique|DBCOLUMN_ISUNIQUEDBCOLUMN_ISUNIQUE|VARIANT_TRUE:沒有可以 BaseTableName 中傳回基底資料表的資料表中的兩個資料列有相同的值，此資料行中。VARIANT_TRUE: No two rows in the base table-the table returned in BaseTableName-can have the same value in this column. IsUnique 保證能為 VARIANT_TRUE，如果資料行代表機碼本身，或是否有類型只適用於此資料行的 UNIQUE 條件約束。IsUnique is guaranteed to be VARIANT_TRUE if the column represents a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column.

VARIANT_FALSE:資料行可以包含基底資料表中重複的值。VARIANT_FALSE: The column can contain duplicate values in the base table. 此資料行的預設值是 VARIANT_FALSE。The default of this column is VARIANT_FALSE.| |IsKeyIsKey|DBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMNDBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMN|VARIANT_TRUE:資料行是一組資料列集中的資料行的其中一個，結合起來，可唯一識別資料列。VARIANT_TRUE: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. 具有設定為 VARIANT_TRUE 的 IsKey 的資料行集必須唯一識別資料列集中的資料列。The set of columns with IsKey set to VARIANT_TRUE must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 沒有這個資料行集是資料行的最少的需求。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 這組資料行可能會產生來自基底資料表主索引鍵、 唯一條件約束或唯一索引。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index.

VARIANT_FALSE:資料行不是需要唯一識別資料列。VARIANT_FALSE: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |IsAutoIncrementIsAutoIncrement|DBCOLUMN_ISAUTOINCREMENTDBCOLUMN_ISAUTOINCREMENT|VARIANT_TRUE:資料行至新的資料列，以固定遞增方式指派值。VARIANT_TRUE: The column assigns values to new rows in fixed increments.

VARIANT_FALSE:資料行不會以新的資料列，以固定遞增方式指派值。VARIANT_FALSE: The column does not assign values to new rows in fixed increments. 此資料行的預設值是 VARIANT_FALSE。The default of this column is VARIANT_FALSE.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|DBCOLUMN_BASESCHEMANAMEDBCOLUMN_BASESCHEMANAME|包含資料行的資料存放區中的結構描述名稱。The name of the schema in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底結構描述名稱，則為 null 值。A null value if the base schema name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值為 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseCatalogNameBaseCatalogName|DBCOLUMN_BASECATALOGNAMEDBCOLUMN_BASECATALOGNAME|包含資料行的資料存放區中的類別目錄名稱。The name of the catalog in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底目錄名稱，則為 null 值。A null value if the base catalog name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值為 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|DBCOLUMN_BASETABLENAMEDBCOLUMN_BASETABLENAME|資料表或檢視中包含之資料行的資料存放區的名稱。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底資料表名稱，則為 null 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值為 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|DBCOLUMN_BASECOLUMNNAMEDBCOLUMN_BASECOLUMNNAME|在資料存放區中的資料行名稱。The name of the column in the data store. 這可能是傳回 [ColumnName] 欄中，如果原先使用別名的資料行名稱不同。This might be different from the column name returned in the ColumnName column if an alias was used. 如果無法判斷基底資料行名稱，或如果資料列集資料行衍生而來但不是完全相同，資料中的資料行存放區，則為 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此資料行的預設值為 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| > [!NOTE] > 若要確定中繼資料資料行傳回正確的資訊，您必須呼叫具有`behavior`參數設為`KeyInfo`。To make sure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call with the `behavior` parameter set to `KeyInfo`. 否則，一些結構描述資料表中的資料行可能會傳回預設值，null，或不正確的資料。Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data.

returns.span: 陣列中 的執行個體數目。

span.span: The number of instances of in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於大部分的應用程式，方法提供有效率的方法用來擷取所有的資料行，而不是個別擷取每個資料行。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, instead of retrieving each column individually. 您可以傳遞陣列包含少於一個產生的資料列中包含的資料行數目。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 資料量陣列會保存已複製到陣列。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 您也可以傳遞其長度大於包含在產生的資料列中的資料行數目的陣列。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 對於 null 資料庫資料行來說，這個方法會傳回 。This method returns for null database columns. ## Examples [!code-csharp[OleDbDataReader_GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/oledbdatareader_getvalues/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OleDbDataReader_GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/oledbdatareader_getvalues/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來處理多個可以執行批次 SQL 陳述式所產生的結果。Used to process multiple results that can be generated by executing batch SQL statements. 根據預設，資料讀取器定位於第一個結果。By default, the data reader is positioned on the first result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設位置之前第一筆記錄。The default position of the is before the first record. 因此，您必須呼叫開始存取任何資料。Therefore, you must call to start accessing any data. 雖然正在使用中，相關聯忙碌處理直到您呼叫。While the is being used, the associated is busy serving it until you call . ## Examples 下列範例會建立，則，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 此範例會讀取資料，並將它寫出到主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最後，範例會關閉，然後。Finally, the example closes the and then the . summary.span: 取得因執行 SQL 陳述式所變更、插入或刪除的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.

value.span: 已變更、插入或刪除的資料列數目；如果沒有任何資料列受到影響或陳述式失敗，則為 0；如果是 SELECT 陳述式，則為 -1。

span.span: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed; and -1 for SELECT statements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性才會設定讀取所有資料列，而且您關閉。The property is not set until all rows are read and you close the . 這個屬性的值是累計的。The value of this property is cumulative. 例如，如果在批次模式中，值插入兩筆記錄是兩個。For example, if two records are inserted in batch mode, the value of is two. 並是您可以呼叫之後的唯一屬性已關閉。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed.

span.span: Gets the number of fields in the that are not hidden.
The number of fields that are not hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會用來判斷 中有多少欄位是可見的。This value is used to determine how many fields in the are visible. 例如，部分主索引鍵上的 SELECT 會傳回索引鍵的剩餘部分做為隱藏欄位。For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields. 隱藏欄位永遠會附加在可見欄位之後。The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.

span.span: DataAdapters and DataReaders
